subject: Re: Quickship and Limited/Discontinued stock banners

Hey Heath, Just a few small adjustments to be made to all the Quick Ship stuff

  • The hero banner on the home page, can this be the first banner that appears when you visit the website
  • On the hero banner, the heading 'Quick Ship', can you change to Gueda font (attached in case you don't have it)
Lucy, is there anything you have picked up? Warm regards, Keenan Druce Graphic Designer t +61 1800.62.64.62  Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000  acoufelt.com

Ta

Warm regards,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

We're looking to indicate a new 'Quick Ship' and 'Discontinued and limited stock' feature on some of our carpet tile and panel colourways on the AU site ONLY. We've mocked up the concept/application in the attached PDF.

Essentially what we're requiring is:

1. Application of these banners across applicable carpet tile and panel colour swatches on individual product pages (PNG images for banners attached). Keenan has said he can also apply them to each swatch himself and send these across to you if that helps. Not sure which option would be faster/easier.

2. A 'Quick Ship' explainer on applicable products/collections where Quick Ship colours are listed (I'm not fussed whether this is displayed on top of or below the specification table). You'll see this on pages 2 and 3 of the PDF. Copy is:

The Quick Ship offering by Acoufelt signifies our commitment to stocking products with minimal lead times. If a product is displayed with a Quick Ship symbol, this means the product is constantly being produced to replenish stock levels.

If a product is not indicated with the Quick Ship banner, minimum order quantities and lead times apply.


2. A homepage banner explaining what this new label is.

I've attached a table with the collections and colourways that need to be labelled with either the 'Quick Ship' or the 'Discontinued' banner. The discontinued banner will not need an explainer FYI.

Let me know if you have any questions? Thanks so much.

Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager


t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310
Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com
